input.activity_signal: Company was acquired and rebranded as GoTo Connect in 2020 according to web search results ("Jive's Virtual Phone Solution is Now Officially GoTo Connect" from goto.com dated June 16, 2020). Email contact uses logmein.com domain, indicating corporate acquisition. No recent FCC filings since 2019, with latest filing being 2019-05-23.
input.product_summary: Jive Communications provided cloud-based hosted VoIP and unified communications services to businesses, offering enterprise-grade voice calling, conferencing, messaging, and related communication features through their Jive Cloud platform.
